00020     SEFormatWav::SEFormatWav()
00021     {
00022         this->setObjectName("SEFormatWav");
00023         m_logger = new Logger(this);
00024 
00025         m_encodeWidget = new OptionWidget();
00026         m_encodeWidget->setObjectName("EncodeWidget");
00027         m_decodeWidget = new OptionWidget();
00028         m_decodeWidget->setObjectName("DecodeWidget");
00029 
00030         connect(m_encodeWidget, SIGNAL(optionHasChanged()), this, SLOT(optionHasChanged()));
00031     }
00032 
00033     SEFormatWav::~SEFormatWav()
00034     {
00035         delete m_encodeWidget;
00036         delete m_decodeWidget;
00037         delete m_logger;
00038     }

00065     QPointer<Audio> SEFormatWav::encodeAudio(QPointer<Audio> audio, bool dontDuplicate)
00066     {
00067         return updateAudio(audio, m_encodeWidget, dontDuplicate);
00068     }
00069 
00070     QPointer<Audio> SEFormatWav::decodeAudio(QPointer<Audio> audio, bool dontDuplicate)
00071     {
00072         return updateAudio(audio, m_decodeWidget, dontDuplicate);
00073     }
00074 
00075     QPointer<Audio> SEFormatWav::updateAudio(QPointer<Audio> aud, OptionWidget* w, bool dontDuplicate)
00076     {
00077         QPointer<Audio> wav;
00078         if (dontDuplicate)
00079         {
00080             wav = new AudioWav(aud); // don't copy wave data
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084             wav = new AudioWav(*aud); // duplicate wave into a new one
00085         }
00086 
00087         AudioWav* newAudio = ((AudioWav*)wav.data());
00088 
00089         newAudio->setNbBitsUsed(w->nbBits());
00090         newAudio->setNbChannelUsed(w->channels());
00091         newAudio->setDistribution(w->distribution());
00092         newAudio->setHeaderPosition(w->headerPosition());
00093 
00094         return wav;
00095     }
00096

00109     {
